= tkinter-tools =

The tkinter-tools contains some useful Tkinter tools.

You can find the source here: [http://code.google.com/p/python-code-snippets/source/browse/#svn/tkinter-tools /tkinter-tools]

Use this svn properties:
{{{
svn:external http://python-code-snippets.googlecode.com/svn/tkinter-tools/ tkinter-tools
}}}

=== automenu.py ===

A menu generator for simple Tkinter apps. See [http://code.google.com/p/python-code-snippets/source/browse/tkinter-tools/automenu_demo.py automenu_demo.py]
